strings.schematron.title: CICGDDP Rules

alert.M1.div: Check that the metadata has a title

alert.M2.div: Check that the metadata has a abstract

strings.M3: [Topic Category] - Metadata must have at least one topic category.

alert.M3.div: Check that the metadata has at least one topic category assigned

alert.M41.div: Check that the metadata has a publisher defined in the Citation.

alert.M42.div: Check that the publisher in the Citation has either an orgainzation or individual name.

alert.M51.div: Check that the metadata has an originator defined in the Citation.

alert.M52.div: Check that the originator in the Citation has either an orgainzation or individual name.

strings.M6: [Publication Date] - Metadata must have a publication date.

alert.M6.div: Check that the metadata has a valid date or date-time with type set to "publication".

strings.M7: [Distribution Format] - Metadata must have a distribution format.

alert.M7.div: Check that the metadata has a valid distribution format.
